Title: Sekonda Seksy gold plated circle mother of pearl watch 4850.37
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Sekonda Seksy gold plated circle mother of pearl watch 4850.37 RRP £89.99 Now £44.99 Description This feminine Sekonda Seksy watch features a double open circle polished finish design with a wave of crystals running across the gold plated bracelet. The pretty round shimmering mother of pearl dial has 4 batons to mark the hours and it securely fastens with a folding clasp. 30m water resistant. We are authorised stockists of Sekonda and this item comes in the official, original packaging with a genuine 2 year manufacturers warranty.
